EmailTemplate.description: When a case is opened, this email is sent to the customer
EmailTemplate.name: Anchor Support Case Open
EmailTemplate.subject: You've Submitted a Case with BlueWave Anchor Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.SuppliedName},
Thank you for submitting a case with BlueWave Anchor Support. Case # {!Case.CaseNumber} is being evaluated and the most appropriate representative is being assigned to fix this issue. You should receive a response to your inquiry shortly.
Thanks for being part of the BlueWave Community - All of us here at BlueWave
